DuplicateArrayKey.code: 'LBL_CHECKSYS_DB_SUPPORT_NOT_AVAILABLE' => 'Database Support was not found. Please make sure you have the necessary drivers for one of the following supported Database Types: MySQL, MS SQLServer, Oracle, or DB2. You might need to uncomment the extension in the php.ini file, or recompile with the right binary file, depending on your version of PHP. Please refer to your PHP Manual for more information on how to enable Database Support.'

DuplicateArrayKey.code:
'LBL_FORECASTS_CONFIG_HELP_RANGES' => 'Configure how you would like to categorize {{forecastByModule}}.

Please note that the Range settings cannot be changed after the first commit. For upgraded instances, the Range setting is locked in with existing Forecast data.

You may select two or more categories based on probability ranges or create categories which are not based on probability.

There are check-boxes to the left of your custom categories; use these to decide which ranges will be included within the Forecast amount committed and reported to managers.

A user may change the include/exclude status and category of {{forecastByModule}} manually from their worksheet.'

'LBL_HELP_RECORDS' => 'The {{plural_module_name}} module allows you to track individual sales from start to finish. Each {{module_name}} record represents a prospective sale and includes relevant sale data as well as relating to other important records such as {{quotes_module}}, {{contacts_module}}, etc. An {{module_name}} will typically progress through several Sales Stages until it is marked either "Closed Won" or "Closed Lost". {{plural_module_name}} can be leveraged even further by using Sugar\'s {{forecasts_singular_module}}ing module to understand and predict sales trends as well as focus work to achieve sales quotas.'
